arabic_text: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: (5) In the victory of Allāh.[1141] He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
footnotes: [1141]- i.e., the victory given by Allāh to a people of the Scripture (Christians) over the Magians of Persia.
